actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972, as amended, to provide civil penalties for noncompliance with the terms and conditions of any ocean dumping permit issued thereunder.

summary.text: Amends the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972 to require that all ocean dumping permits include a delayed compliance penalty to be imposed for failure to meet deadlines established in the permit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Marine Protection, Research, and Sanctuaries Act of 1972, as amended, to provide civil penalties for noncompliance with the terms and conditions of any ocean dumping permit issued thereunder.
